targets.expr: avg_over_time({job="timelord"} |~ "tag=" | logfmt | tag = "bluebox_finish" | unwrap iterations [24h]) by (field_vdf)
avg_over_time({job="timelord"} |~ "tag=" | logfmt | tag = "bluebox_finish" | unwrap duration [24h]) by (field_vdf)
avg_over_time({job="timelord"} |~ "Received compact proof" | logfmt | unwrap height [$__interval]) by (bluebox_index)
avg_over_time({job="timelord"} |~ "tag=" | logfmt | tag = "bluebox_finish" | unwrap iterations [1m]) by (field_vdf)

avg_over_time({job="timelord"} |~ "tag=" | logfmt | tag = "bluebox_finish" | unwrap iterations[1m]) by (field_vdf)
/
avg_over_time({job="timelord"} |~ "tag=" | logfmt | tag = "bluebox_finish" | unwrap duration[1m]) by (field_vdf)
avg_over_time({job="timelord"} |~ "tag=" | logfmt | tag = "bluebox_finish" | unwrap duration [1m]) by (field_vdf)
min_over_time({job="timelord"} |~ "tag=" | logfmt | tag = "bluebox_launch" | unwrap pending [1m]) by (unit)
avg_over_time({chia_service_type="full_node",job="fullnode"}|~"Size of mempool"|pattern "<_> Size of mempool: <mempool_size> spends, <_>"|unwrap mempool_size [30s])
